Package com.seatunity.boardingpass.fragment

Class Summary
AccountListFragment Inflates the FragmentReminder if the user is not logged in or has not yet registered, otherwise inflates FragmentMyAccount containing the information of the user.
FragmentAbout Shows some static-information about the app.
FragmentAddBoardingPassDuringLogin If the logged-in user doesn't have any boarding pass to show in list, then this fragment will be inflated with a plus button to add new boarding-pass from it.
FragmentBoardingPasses This fragment loads & shows the saved boarding-passes from the local-DB.
FragmentGetBoardingPasseFromBackend This fragment retrieves boarding-pass list from the server if the device is connected to the internet, otherwise it loads the boarding-passes from the local-db.
FragmentLogin This fragment holds a simple UI & API methods to log-in into the application.
FragmentMyAccount This fragment shows the profile-data of the user.
FragmentPastBoardingPasses Fragment showing the past boarding-passes
FragmentReminder When any unregistered user prompts to show own-profile, this static fragment reminds him/her about registering into the app.
FragmentSeatMet Shows the list of the seat-mates.
FragmentSignUp Fragment containing the UI & necessary API call to support a new user registration process.
FragmentSingleSeatMet Fragment containing the details of & opeation related to a single seat-mate.
FragmentTermsAndCondition Shows static text on the "Terms & Condition" about using this application.
FragmentUpcomingBoardingPassDetails Fragment showing the future boarding-pass list.
HomeFragment This fragment is shown when the user has not yet registered to the system or has been loagged out.
HomeListFragment This fragment holds all other fragments in the app.
PastBoardingPassListFragment Fragment showing the past boarding-pass list.
TabFragment A dummy fragment containing only an abstract method to implement the back-button pressed action.
